quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
Imagination is more important than knowledge.
All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.
Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Don't worry about a thing, 'cause every little thing gonna be all right.
Work eliminates the three great evils: boredom, immorality, and poverty.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
It is better to light a candle than curse the darkness.
In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
Fortune favors the bold.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
Where there is love there is life.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Happiness depends upon ourselves.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Life is not about waiting for the storm to pass but learning to dance in the rain.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
What we think, we become.
In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
I think, therefore I exist.
Cogito, ergo sum.
Je pense, donc je suis.
I'm still hungry.
I do not originate from any cause.
I don't see any American Dream, I just see the American Nightmare.
I truly love and respect Jesus Christ, but all those who claim to be his believers speak and act contrary to Jesus' teachings.
I did not mock, grieve, or despise human actions, but only sought to understand them.
I cannot even imagine a God who rewards and punishes his creations, or who has a will that we can understand.
I have heard of making the people comfortable against the enemy, but I have not heard of moving the people to avoid the enemy.
I don't know what weapons we will fight with in World War III. But World War 4 will be fought with sticks and stones.
I am dying but I am not surrendering! Hello, my country. July 20, 1941
I am China. China can't achieve anything without me.
I would rather have dangerous freedom than live as a peaceful slave.
I can calculate the movements of heavenly bodies, but I cannot calculate the madness of people.
As for me, I only know that I know nothing.
Let's go!
